content: ॠ {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} An interjection of (1) terror; (2) warding off; (3) reproach or censure; (4) compassion; (5) remembrance. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (ॠः) {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Bhairava. {@--2@} A Dānava or demon. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} The mother of the gods; also of the demons. {@--2@} Recollection. {@--3@} Motion, going. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} The breast.
